IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LIFESPAN IS THE ONLY COMPREHENSIVE AGENCY IN THE COMMUNITY WHOSE SOLE MISSION IS TO HELP OLDER ADULTS TAKE ON BOTH THE CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES OF LONGER LIFE. WE ACHIEVE THIS BY PROVIDING A CONTINUUM OF DIRECT SERVICES, ADVOCACY, GUIDANCE, PROFESSIONAL TRAINING AND COMMUNITY EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: LIFESPAN IS THE ONLY COMPREHENSIVE AGENCY IN THE COMMUNITY WHOSE SOLE MISSION IS TO HELP OLDER ADULTS TAKE ON BOTH THE CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES OF LONGER LIFE. WE ACHIEVE THIS BY PROVIDING A CONTINUUM OF DIRECT SERVICES, ADVOCACY, GUIDANCE, PROFESSIONAL TRAINING AND COMMUNITY EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: ELDER ABUSE PREVENTION PROGRAM - PROVIDE INTERVENTION SERVICES IN MONROE AND NINE OTHER COUNTIES INCLUDING GENESEE, LIVINGSTON, ONTARIO, ORLEANS, SENECA, SCHUYLER, WAYNE, WYOMING AND YATES. CLIENTS SERVED: 354

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ELDERSOURCE/NY CONNECTS - PROVIDE INFORMATION AND GUIDANCE ABOUT ELDERCARE/LONG-TERM CARE WITH LINKAGE TO SERVICES FOR OLDER ADULTS, IN-HOME GERIATRIC ASSESSMENT, CARE MANAGEMENT AND CAREGIVER CONSULTATION, AND DEPRESSION SCREENING AND COUNSELING. CLIENTS SERVED: 14,654

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CAREGIVER SERVICES & EDUCATION - PROVIDE INFO, EDUCATION, AND GUIDANCE AND RESPITE TO CAREGIVERS. CLIENTS SERVED: 1,498

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: DIRECTOR OF FINANCE (LEFT IN FISCAL YEAR)

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECT RESEARCH AND ANALYSIS OF STATE AND LOCAL LEGISLATION AND POLICY RELATING TO HEALTH CARE, ELDER ADVOCACY RELATED TO LONG TERM CARE, ELDER ABUSE PREVENTION AND TRANSPORTATION FOR THE ELDERLY. WORK WITH NEW YORK STATE COALITION ON AGING TO DEVELOP AND IMPLEMENT APPROPRIATE STRATEGIES TO ADVOCATE FOR THE ELDERLY IN THE PREVIOUSLY DESCRIBED INTEREST AREAS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN NET ASSETS OF DEV. FUND

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DRAFT IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND, UPON APPROVAL, IS DISTRIBUTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR APPROVAL PRIOR TO SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY WITH THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. IF THERE IS A CONFLICT, IT IS BROUGHT TO THE BOARD CHAIR'S ATTENTION FOR FURTHER ACTION, IF REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD CHAIR AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEW THE CEO/PRESIDENT'S SALARY ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
PROFESSIONAL CONTRACT SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 1,950,758. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 113,005. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 3,649. TOTAL EXPENSES 2,067,412.
EQUITY IN RESULTS OF JOINT VENTURE 3,419. BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN NET ASSETS OF DEVELOPMENT FUND 94,651.
LIFESPAN HAS A FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WHO ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: THE EXCLUSIVE SUPPORT AND BENEFIT OF LIFESPAN OF GREATER ROCHESTER, INC.
